isis.stitle: DT 466 / DT 570 / HT 570 Service Manual - 2004 Emissions with EGR - Crankcase, Crankshaft, and Camshaft - Installation - Tensioning Procedure for Torque-to-Yield Bearing Bolts

svcproc.title: Tensioning Procedure for Torque-to-Yield Bearing Bolts

figure.caption: Recommended main bearing bolt torque sequence

step1.para: Torque the new main bearing cap bolts No.1 through No.7.

step2.para: Tighten each main bearing bolt to 136 N·m (100 lbf·ft) using the recommended torque sequence.
Check crankshaft end play using a dial indicator as follows:

step3.para: Mount the dial indicator onto crankcase with indicator tip on crankcase flange face.
Lightly pry the crankshaft forward and zero indicator.
Pry crankshaft rearward and record dial indicator reading. Repeat to ensure an accurate reading.

If end play exceeds specifications, replace thrust bearing and recheck crankshaft end play. If end play is less than specified, loosen the thrust bearing cap, reposition, torque and check end play again.

step2.para: Tighten each main bearing bolt to 177 N·m (130 lbf·ft) using the recommended torque sequence.

calloutgroup.callout1: Head of bolt with mark, position 1
Head of bolt with mark, position 2 (bolt stretches)

step2.para: Use a permanent marker to add a mark on each bolt head and another mark 90° clockwise on the main cap. Also mark the socket to match the bolt marking.
Rotate each crankshaft main bearing bolt 90 degrees (¼ turn).

step1.para: Check crankshaft end play using a dial indicator as follows:

step2.para: Mount the dial indicator onto crankcase with indicator tip on crankcase flange face.
Lightly pry the crankshaft forward and zero indicator.
Then pry crankshaft rearward and record dial indicator reading. Repeat to ensure an accurate reading.
If end play exceeds specifications, replace thrust bearing and recheck crankshaft end play. If end play is less than specified, loosen main bearing caps, reposition, torque and check end play again.
